definition: lacking hair on all or most of the scalp, to grow bald
details:
adjective
- lacking hair on all or most of the scalp
= example: lacking hair on all or most of the scalp
= synonyms: bald-headed, bald-pated
- without the natural or usual covering
= example: without the natural or usual covering
= synonyms: denuded, denudate
- with no effort to conceal
= synonyms: barefaced
verb
- to grow bald
= example: to grow bald
